# Where Next

 * The book files can be found on [github](https://github.com/pssguy/user2016) so that if you clone it for your own personal book other videos could be substituted in place of mine. I plan to upload the underlying dataset and code for scraping website and producing output

 * You can also access this via the edit button in the toolbar at top of each page if you want to point out errors or make suggestion
